channel.title: Worn items req

item.title: Worn items req
item.dc:creator: @SmokeSome SmokeSome
item.description:
@SmokeSome wrote:

how do i make it so you need a certain item to do a command?

i thought it was this but it just teleports me with or without the item.

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("mmhmm")) { if(playerHasItem(6570)) teleportToX = 3093; teleportToY = 3494; heightLevel = 0; updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; } else { sendMessage("okay whatever"); }
any ideas? :o

Read full topic
